Class NioServerBossPool

    public class NioServerBossPool
extends AbstractNioBossPool<NioServerBoss>
    Holds NioServerBoss instances to use

    • Constructor Detail

      • NioServerBossPool

        public NioServerBossPool(Executor bossExecutor,
                 int bossCount,
                 ThreadNameDeterminer determiner)
        Create a new instance
        Parameters:
        bossExecutor - the Executor to use for server the NioServerBoss
        bossCount - the number of NioServerBoss instances this NioServerBossPool will hold
        determiner - the ThreadNameDeterminer to use for name the threads. Use null if you not want to set one explicit.
